document.full_text: less than 24 hours after earning their first victory of the season, the red sox were battered by the yankees as their record fell to 1-7.
document.title: relief in boston proves fleeting as worries about pitching staff rise with its e.r.a.
lines_and_colors: less than 24 hours after earning their first victory of the season, the red sox were battered by the yankees as their record fell to 1-7.
